Ability.Description: Increases Armor by 2000 and all resists by 65 on all party or raid members. Allies can only have 1 Anthem or Favor at a time.

Whenever your health goes below 30%, your movement speed is increased by 10% and all healing effects on you are increased by 10%.

Rank.Description: Increases all of your ally's attributes by 1% if your ally is affected by Motif of Bravery, Motif of Regeneration and Motif of Tenacity. Lasts 20 seconds.
Increases all of your ally's attributes by 2% if your ally is affected by Motif of Bravery, Motif of Regeneration and Motif of Tenacity. Lasts 20 seconds.

Ability.Description: Causes Combo Points to persist when using Codas. Lasts 15s.

Rank.Description: Your Cadence heals up to 5 party and raid members for 2% of your Attack Power each time it deals damage.

Your Cadence heals up to 5 party and raid members for 6% of your Attack Power each time it deals damage.

Using a Coda has a 20% chance per Combo Point spent, to apply a stacking buff to you, increasing your Attack Power by 8% per stack. Maximum 5 stacks.

Ability.Description: Each time a Coda is used, the Rogue has a 20% chance per Combo Point to gain Harmonic Energy, increasing damage by 5%. This buff stacks up to 5 times. Harmonic Distortion consumes 1 stack of Harmonic Energy and heals a single ally for 1554 to 1718 health.

Rank.Description: Cadenza reduces the cooldown of Verse of Agony and Verse of Vitality by 1 second per second of channel.
Cadenza reduces the cooldown of Verse of Agony and Verse of Vitality by 2 seconds per second of channel.

Deals 3078 Life damage over 2s. Awards 1 Combo Point each second.
